numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that more women visit their parents than men.
2. I notice that more women video-call their parents than men.
3. The percentages are low for women.
4. The percentages are low for men.
5. I wonder why women are more likely to contact their parents than men are.
7. In modern times, texting is a main form of communication.
8. People in my community do a lot of texting.
9. Texting is a part of daily life in my community.
10. The title should be "Communication With My Parents Through A Screen".
